titles.title: And They Sang As It Were A New Song

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
And they sang as it were a new song
Before the throne, the throne of God.
And they sang as it were a new song
Before the throne of the living God.
And no man can learn that new song
But the redeemed from the earth,
And no man can learn that new song
But the redeemed from the earth.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
These are they which were not defiled with women,
For the are known as virgins,
These are they which follow the Lamb wherever He goeth,
They are the firstfruits unto God and unto the Lamb.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
These are they which were redeemed from among men,
And in their mouth was found no guile.
For they are without fault before the throne of God;
They are the firstfruits unto God and unto the Lamb.
